sections.title: Avax rent a car offer 3 types of motorcycles:

html: • Travel through traffic faster motorbike rental can enable you to ride around static queues and save time on journeys.
• Easier parking it’s much easier to find a spot for a bike in Split than a car or other vehicle.
• Avoid public transport with motorbike hire Split you can avoid public transport that is not always on time.
• Commitment free travel with Avax rental bike you can borrow a bike for a day, a week or on a monthly basis – whatever suits you
• ACCEPTED: CASH, American Express, Diners Club, MasterCard, Visa

• NOT ACCEPTED: Pre-paid credit cards, Laser, Maestro, Debit, or Switch cards. Make sure you have a large enough limit to cover the excess.In the event that you fail to present a valid credit card or lack of sufficient funds available on the credit card, we may refuse to release the vehicle.

• NOTE: We do accept cash payment for car rental.(You can pay car rental price in cash, but secure deposit should be authorized via card) If you don't have card you will need to take full premium insurance +40 Eur on your rental price for no card fee.
